name: Blade Runner
content:
game:
  game_id: bladerunner
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc
    requires: base
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/CD1/1.TLK
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/CD2/2.TLK
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/CD3/3.TLK
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/CD4/A.TLK
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/base/COREANIM.DAT
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/base/MODE.MIX
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/base/MUSIC.MIX
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/CD1/OUTTAKE1.MIX
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/CD2/OUTTAKE2.MIX
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/CD3/OUTTAKE3.MIX
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/CD4/OUTTAKE4.MIX
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/base/SFX.MIX
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/base/SPCHSFX.TLK
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/base/STARTUP.MIX
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/CD1/VQA1.MIX
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/CD2/VQA2.MIX
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/CD3/VQA3.MIX
- execute:
    args: $DISC/CD1/CDFRAMES.DAT  $GAMEDIR/CDFRAMES1.DAT
    file: /bin/cp
- execute:
    args: $DISC/CD2/CDFRAMES.DAT  $GAMEDIR/CDFRAMES2.DAT
    file: /bin/cp
- execute:
    args: $DISC/CD3/CDFRAMES.DAT  $GAMEDIR/CDFRAMES3.DAT
    file: /bin/cp
- execute:
    args: $DISC/CD4/CDFRAMES.DAT  $GAMEDIR/CDFRAMES4.DAT
    file: /bin/cp
- execute:
    args: -R 775  $GAMEDIR
    file: /bin/chmod
scummvm:
  fullscreen: true
